ygData.subject: Re: New Topic, Languages!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm... I know Common, Elvish, Tierdall, Old Erudian, Elder Tierdall, Gnoll, Lizardman, Gnomish, Dwarvish, and a few others I can t remember.  The only one s I
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm... I know Common, Elvish, Tierdall, Old Erudian, Elder Tierdall, Gnoll,
Lizardman, Gnomish, Dwarvish, and a few others I can't remember. The only
one's I can truly understand are Common, Evlish, and Dwarvish.

Tiresias
Servant of Erollisi Marr

Now if I can only memmorize that many languages in real life. =)


----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Ferriera <cferriera@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 11:56 AM
Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: New Topic, Languages!!!


> From: Chris Ferriera <cferriera@...>
>
> HI all, I wanted to start a new discussion, and it is on Languages.
>
>
> The ones I know are Common, Elf, Barbarian, Dwarf, Halfling and
> GNOLL! Yes I learned Gnoll!. I was wondering if anyone else has learned a
> not all-to-common language? And if so, what where how and why? I got Gnoll
> from a halfling who macro'd me for a good 15 mins.
>
> -Dyce
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Have you visited the new ONElist home page lately?
